t: Lanz of Salzburg at Amazon Women’s Clothing store
s: Well-made, bright colors by iconic brand. Cozy and warm in winter months. Runs large but shrinks slightly. ... I thought that a large would be the right size, but apparently I would have been fine with a medium. I could have sent it back for an exchange, but I was so happy to be wearing wonderful pajamas again I just roll the cuffs and arms up. If more patterns become available I will order another set in medium. ... I have love Lanz of Salzburg ...
